roleset.name: tremble, moving vigorously back and forth
roleset.note: SHAKE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3, amuse-31.1, body_internal_states-40.6, crane-40.3.2, funnel-9.3-2-1, knead-26.5. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from shake.01-v)

SHAKING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, shake.01. Corresponds to Vncls modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3, amuse-31.1, body_internal_states-40.6, crane-40.3.2, funnel-9.3-2-1, knead-26.5. (from shaking.01-n)

example.name: transitive agentive
example.text: But why-1 should an iffy $6.79 billion leveraged buy-out deal shake the foundations of the entire stock market *trace*-1?
example.arg: an iffy $6.79 billion leveraged buy-out deal
the foundations of the entire stock market

example.name: ergative
example.text: The walls shook; the building rocked.

example.name: both args
example.text: Also , anyone notice the shots -LRB- on cnn at least -RRB- of Ted Kennedy 's constant negative head shaking ?

example.name: transitive
example.text: Dealers said the market still hasn't shaken off its nervousness after its bumpy ride of the past several sessions, caused by interest-rate increases last week and Wall Street's 6.9% plunge Friday.
example.arg: after its bumpy ride of the past several sessions, caused by interest-rate increases last week and Wall Street's 6.9% plunge Friday

roleset.name: tremble very badly
roleset.note: SHAKE_UP-V NOTES: Really quite similar to the "tremble" roleset (id="shake.01") above. (from shake.03-v)

example.name: agentive
example.text: John's actions at the zoo really shook Mary up.

example.name: ergative (and Elvis!)
example.text: Ah-huh, ah-huh, I-1 'm all shook up *trace*-1.
